Each Euiago contains one Pardo and one Reiago. A planet’s progression through one time continuum creates a 45° shift in the angular rotation of particle spin, or 1/8th of a full 360° rotation of parti- cles, thus one continuum represents one dimensional Octave. One Octave = a 4,426-year track of time. One dimension contains two time continua, or two Octaves. A planet’s progression through one dimension creates a 90° shift (2 shifts of 45°) in the angular rotation of particle spin, or one-fourth of a full 360° rotation, thus one dimension represents one Harmonic Quadrant. One Quadrant = an 8,852-year track of time. Three dimensions, three Quadrants, or six Octaves (time continua) represent one Harmonic Universe. One Har- monic Universe = a 26,556-year track of time. As a planet progresses through the first two Pardo Octaves, the angular rotation of particle spin shifts 90° from its original position. Upon entering the two Reiago Octaves in the parallel universe, the angular rotation of parti- cle spin undergoes a 90° reverse rotation, bringing the angular rotation of particle spin back to its original position.
